turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two large pizzas with thin crust one meat lovers and one veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry i hear an echo, do you have your headphones in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let's try again and i'll try and get that order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two large thin crust pizzas, one meat lover, one veggie lover.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and other requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you ordered 2 large thin crust pizzas, 1 meat lovers, and 1 veggie lovers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having your pizzas delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, please note that the price does not include tip.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be delivered in about 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
